Description: Serpentine amuletic stela of almost semi-circular form with a representation of a winged scarab with striated elytra on the top; the other surfaces are inscribed with decorative frieze, representation various protective deities, and registers of hieroglyphs - a magical/protection text of the type found on cippi.
Curator's comments: Published by Carol Andrews in Fs. H. Smith
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
